chapters.title: Python Basics
chapters.chapter_summary: Introduces Python's fundamental building blocks including variables, basic data types (integers, floats, strings), and core data structures (lists, dictionaries, tuples, sets). Covers basic syntax, expressions, and statements. [^1]

chapters.title: Operators, Expressions, and Data Manipulation
chapters.chapter_summary: Explores Python's operator system including arithmetic, comparison, logical, and bitwise operators. Covers expression evaluation, operator precedence, slicing, indexing, and various data manipulation techniques. [^20]

chapters.title: Program Structure and Control Flow
chapters.chapter_summary: Details Python's control flow mechanisms including conditionals (if/elif/else), loops (while/for), and flow control statements (break, continue, pass). Emphasizes proper indentation and statement blocks. [^39]

chapters.title: Objects, Types, and Protocols
chapters.chapter_summary: Examines Python's object model, type system, and protocols. Covers special methods (magic methods), duck typing, polymorphism, and the distinction between mutable and immutable objects. [^58]

chapters.title: Functions
chapters.chapter_summary: Comprehensive coverage of Python functions including parameter passing, return values, lambda functions, closures, decorators, and scope rules. Discusses namespaces, global/nonlocal keywords, and various parameter types. [^77]

chapters.title: Generators
chapters.chapter_summary: Focuses on generators and iterators, covering yield statements, lazy evaluation, generator expressions, and the iteration protocol. Introduces coroutines and generator methods (send, throw, close). [^96]

chapters.title: Classes and Object-Oriented Programming
chapters.chapter_summary: In-depth exploration of object-oriented programming in Python, including class definition, inheritance, method resolution order, properties, metaclasses, and best practices for class design. [^115]

chapters.title: Modules and Packages
chapters.chapter_summary: Covers Python's module and package system including import mechanisms, namespace management, package structure, module search path, and package initialization with __init__.py files. [^133]

chapters.title: Input/Output and Environment
chapters.chapter_summary: Examines input/output operations including file handling, path manipulation, directory operations, environment variables, and standard streams (stdin, stdout, stderr). Covers both text and binary I/O with proper encoding handling. [^150]
